svg.title: Progressive Review Depth Framework - Intelligent Review Orchestration
svg.desc: Multi-layered visualization showing progressive review depth levels from surface scanning to deep architectural analysis with AI and human intervention points
svg.text: Intelligent Review Orchestration with Adaptive Depth Control

g.text: Complexity: High | Risk: Medium | Priority: Critical
Time Budget: 45 min | Cost: $78 | Quality Target: 94%
Recommendation: Human security expert review required
Deep system design review, scalability, maintainability
Cost: $240 | Time: 2-4 hours | ROI: Critical issues only
Performance impact, optimization opportunities, resource usage
Cost: $120 | Time: 1-2 hours | ROI: Performance issues
Business logic, algorithms, data flow, edge cases
Cost: $60 | Time: 30-60 min | ROI: Logic errors
Cost: $25 | Time: 15-30 min | ROI: Structure issues
Cost: $5 | Time: 2-5 min | ROI: Quick wins
üîç Analyzing memory usage patterns and database query optimization
AI confidence: 73% (Medium) | Escalation trigger: Security concerns
‚ö† Performance concerns: Database query optimization needed (73% confidence)
üö® Security vulnerability: Authentication bypass potential (45% confidence)
1. Continue to Layer 4 for performance analysis
2. Escalate security concerns to expert reviewer
3. Consider architectural review if issues persist

div.style: position: absolute; left: -10000px; top: auto; width: 1px; height: 1px; overflow: hidden;
div.div: Layer 1: Surface scanning with syntax, formatting, and basic checks analysis
Layer 2: Structural validation covering code organization, patterns, and best practices
Layer 3: Logical structure analysis including business logic, algorithms, data flow, and edge cases
Layer 4: Performance analysis examining impact, optimization opportunities, and resource usage
Layer 5: Deep architectural analysis covering system design, scalability, and maintainability
